title: Question about the free skins per 4 rune pages
body: Can you get a skin for a champion you already own a skin for? Also, I understand picking the skin is a lot to ask for, but can we at least pick the champion we get the skin for? I own every champion, I play maybe 20 of them, I have skins for at least 18 of the 20 that I play.

replies.body: We don't have in-depth details on this yet as we're still a bit away from preseason, but I'm assuming it will be skins for champs you don't own.  I don't think you'll be able to pick, but keep an eye out on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page as we get more info and start to roll these out.
